p: Twenty‐one patients were screened in the study of whom one patient was categorized as a post‐randomization screening failure and not treated. We observed intra‐operatively trochanteric fissures in two of the 20 patients; biomechanical analysis was not performed on these patients at visit 6 (6 weeks post‐operatively).
